alert.note: Alert for Cottonwood (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 11 at 5:31PM CDT until August 11 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN COTTONWOOD COUNTY... At 530 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mountain Lake, or 9 miles northeast of Windom, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...At 5:26 PM CDT trained spotters reported pea sized hail near Mountain Lake. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mountain Lake, Comfrey, and Bingham Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
